title: Cremlino, grazie Papa, da scegliere sede nuovi negoziati
cleaned_sentences: The Kremlin is aware of the Vatican offer to host negotiations between Russia and Ukraine, but no decision has yet been made.
He has it Referred to journalists the ;; spokesperson of the Russian president Dmitrij Peskov.
"Everyone is aware of this initiative of the Pope - he said in a declaration relaunched by Tass -.
There was also a Vatican declaration.
AND, Of course, the Russian part is grateful to all those who are willing to make their contribution.
But they have not yet been made specific decisions on the place to continue the Possible future negotiations ".
